original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, votes as v, users as u WHERE p.Id = ph.PostId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=11
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND posts.Score >= -1 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 11)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E3 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E4E3.Id)
